about_the_game:
Play As An Unnamed Guy And Solve The Mystery Of An Old Mansion While Being Haunted By A Welder! Discover An Epic Journey Through Many Exciting And Hard Levels!





In The Sudden Attack Of A Welder You Will Encounter A Great Story, With Many Interesting Endings. But The Most Important Thing That Always Comes Before Story Is Great Gameplay. In Our Game You Will Be Faced With Many Challenges, That Will Make Your Head Spin Like Never Before!

So, Writing Short This Game Will Feature:

  • Mechanics, That Will Help You Uncover The True Mystery Of A Welder's Mansion

  • A Horror That Will Make You Jump Out From Your Skin, When You Will Be Running From A Welder With Limited Usaged Of Your Inventory

  • And A Deep Story With Many Great Endings To Unfold
